Traits.Name: Body of the Land
Traits.Description: When defeated, roll a d6. The Hob collapses into the natural land, disappearing. Every space of this Hob becomes a height 1 terrain piece (5-6), difficult terrain (2-4), or a pit (1).

Interrupts.Name: Fungal Bounce
Interrupts.Trigger: This hob takes damage from an adjacent foe.
Interrupts.Effect: That foe must save or be shoved 3 and poisoned. Poisoned characters fail the save. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 anyway.
